name: boundary
description:
The boundary command extracts administrative boundaries from OSM data. It identifies:

- Countries (level 2)
- States/provinces (level 4)
- Cities (level 8)
- Districts and neighborhoods

Useful for administrative analysis and regional mapping.

options.-f, --format: Output format: geojson, json, csv (default: geojson)

output:
Boundary polygons with:
- name: Boundary name
- admin_level: OSM admin level (2-11)
- level_name: Human-readable level (country, state, city, etc.)
- ref: Reference code
- wikidata: Wikidata ID
